answers.answer: I wish I knew but hopefully someone will be able to help you.

Are you saying they don't know why her retina detached? This happened to my sister and it was because she has diabetes that wasn't controlled very well. On top of that, she smoked which made it worse. They did surgery but it didn't work for her. I hope it goes better for your sister-in-law.What are they doing at this point? Are they considering surgery? Keep us posted. Wish I could help more!

question: My sister in law is still undiagnosed.Her retina has become detatched   and she may loose her sight.They took some fluid from her eye to  run some tests.She is able to eat but we I don't know if she can hold it down yet.No one on this Forum has any clues  s nor do the doctors.Am willing to hear any theorys.This is an anonymous site. so please feel free to join in.Thanks,Brother in law
title: undiagnosed...
